settings.text:
Hey Hotties, it's Ekam here, founder and Chief Creative Officer of Ekam Organics. I'm so excited and honored that you are here and allowing me to be a part of your daily habits, rituals, and a tool to help you lead a sexier and nourishing life - both on the plate and off. I founded Ekam Organics on the idea of nourishment, introspection, love, and the dual use of food for both energy and pleasure, Ekam Organics is committed to normalizing a positive relationship to food, wellness and oneself.Â 

At Ekam Organics we believe in food as pleasure, as medicine, as a practice that we devote to ourselves daily to show our bodies love. To show those around us nurture, and to maintain well-being. My passion for wellness, cooking, and making others feel loved, safe, and heard (through their relationship with food) is what inspired Ekam Organics.

Founded on the idea of nourishment, introspection, love, and the dual use of food for both energy and pleasure, Ekam Organics is committed to normalizing a positive relationship to food, wellness, and oneself. Feed your soul, love your body, and ignite your inner hottie.

Xx, Ekam Bajwa
